testcase.name: cucumber bdd and pom with test
testcase.system-out: Given Alerts click..........................................................passed Given Handle all alerts.....................................................passed Then Interactions...........................................................passed Then Click droppable button.................................................passed Then Under the simple module drag the “drag me” box to the “drop me” box and verify that dropped.passed And Widgets click...........................................................passed And Click tool Tips button..................................................passed And Hover over the “Hover me to see” button and verify the “You Hovered Over the button” message.passed And Hover over the “Hover me to see” text field and verify “You hovered the text field” message..passed
